title: Gifted RP, but Receiver said that they did not get it
body:
Title, I gave RP to my partner, but they said that they have not gotten it.


EDIT: Can someone check if I gave myself RP twice. I noticed I have a lot of RP and I think that might have been a possibility.

replies.body:
Aw snap, hate to be the bearer of bad news, but it does look like you probably accidentally bought the RP for yourself twice. I'm seeing two transactions for 7200 RP, one happening earlier today and some purchases being made for yourself, and then another 7200 RP bought with no purchases made afterward. 

Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and as long as you haven't used that RP they should be able to get it reversed so you can send it over ^_^!
I'm pretty sure that is what I did. I was about to fill I ticket. Thanks {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
